AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: bedrooms
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Prefabs that include beds, end tables, dressers, etc

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: animals
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Barns, animal rooms, anything that is related to pets, livestock or similar

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: full bases
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Complete bases that include several different structures under the same roof, such as a bedroom / living room / dining room or a combination hospital / research lab / prison

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: food & rec
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Living rooms, kitchens, taverns. Anything having to do with the consumption of food or beverages or colonist recreation

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: healthcare
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Hospitals, medicine rooms, triage rooms, drug labs. Anything having to do with colonist health. Note that this category will be more expensive in the USA

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: research & school
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Research centers and laboratories, as well as schools for children in Biotech

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: farm & nature
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Farms, parks, hydroponics facilities. Anything related to either crops or nature

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: power
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Power generation and storage, as well as related things such as gas or chemfuel networks

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: prisons
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Prefabs including ways to handle prisoners

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: production
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Prefabs consisting of production facilities of all kinds

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: military
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Offensive and defensive structures such as pillboxes, armories, mortar depots, etc

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: temples
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Ideology based structures such as temples, churches, and similar

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: transportation
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Modular roads to make an urban looking cityscape and vehicle related buildings

AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.label: castles & nobility
AlphaPrefabs.PrefabCategoryDef.description: Modular castle pieces to make your own sprawling medieval castle, as well as throne rooms, art galleries, etc
